CreateList.ingredients: warm water ,active dry yeast ,bread flour ,extra virgin olive oil , salt ,sugar
CreateList.instructions:
Proof the yeast, Make and knead the pizza dough,  Let the dough rise, Make-Ahead and Freezing Instructions, Preparing the Pizzas, Flatten dough ball, and stretch out into a round ,Sprinkle pizza peel with corn meal, put flattened dough on top
,Sprinkle cornmeal on pizza stone, slide pizza onto pizza stone in oven, Bake pizza!

Enjoy!
